name: Stay at Alice Springs Hotel
description:
Welcome to Stay at Alice – where outback charm meets central convenience. Nestled right on Todd Mall, Alice Springs’ bustling hub for shopping, dining, and strolling, our location is ideal for experiencing the best of town and the breathtaking outback beyond.
Stay at Alice (formerly Aurora Alice Springs) is more than just a place to rest; it’s a gateway to the iconic MacDonnell Ranges, Standley Chasm, and
Simpson’s Gap – all close by and ready to explore. Perfectly positioned for corporate guests, families, and adventurers alike, we offer complimentary wifi and parking to make every stay seamless.
Experience true Alice Springs hospitality.

groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
This applies to bookings of 12 rooms or more or bookings accompanied by a tour leader (irrespective
of the number of rooms).
All Group Booking requests must be advised in writing.
Final rooming list, ETA, meals and tour requirements are due no later than 14 days prior to arrival.
Porterage is not available.
Groups may be cancelled without penalty up to 31 days in advance of arrival.
Cancellations made between 30–21 days prior to arrival
50% of total accommodation will be charged.
Cancellations made less than 21 days prior to arrival
100% of total accommodation will be charged.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT
Standard Check-in time is from 2.00pm on the day of arrival. Standard Check-out is no later than 10.00am on the day of departure.
A valid photo ID, credit card for damage deposits, incidentals or
$100 Debit Card or $200 cash bond will be required on arrival.

houseRules.notes:
Cancellation policy: 1 day(s) before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay.
Check-in from 2:00 PM to 12:00 AM
Check-out before 10:00 AM
Payment upon arrival by cash, credit and debit cards.
This property may pre-authorize your card before arrival.
Taxes included.
Breakfast not included.

General:
No curfew
No pets allowed.
Children allowed: 2 to 18 years old.
Smoking is allowed in designated areas.
